biotools.summary: StarPep toolbox is a software for studying the antimicrobial peptides' (AMPs) chemical space with molecular network-based representations and similarity searching models. This application aims to contribute to peptide drug repurposing, development, and optimization.

bioschemas.name: StarPep Toolbox
